title: Casebook Of Gregory Hood and Night Watch
description: https://www.podtrac.com/pts/redirect.mp3/archive.org/download/rr22021/CaseClosed761.mp3  This week's Case Closed begins with The Sad Clown, the October 3, 1946, episode of The Casebook Of Gregory Hood. content:encoded:
This week’s Case Closed begins with The Sad Clown, the October 3, 1946, episode of The Casebook Of Gregory Hood.

(29:45) Night Watch closes out this week’s episode with theirs from December 12, 1954. The file is titled Rolling Pin And Luger, though I don’t believe episodes of this series were titled at the time.

Download CaseClosed761

If you enjoy this program every week and would like to help support it, visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you to all who’ve helped out over the last 14 years!
